Class GameView

java.lang.Object
GameView
public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
Java implementation of the View component of the ThreeInARowGame

  • Method Details

    • updateBlock

      protected void updateBlock​(int row, int col, java.lang.String newText, boolean isLegalMove)
      Updates the block at the given row and col after one of the player's moves.
      Parameters:
      row - The row that contains the block
      col - The col that contains the block
      newText - The text to update the gameView block object with
      isLegalMove - Whether or not this block is allowing moves into it
